title: Python Programming
points: Advanced Python concepts (decorators, generators, context managers)
Python libraries for data science (NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn)

title: Data Analysis and Visualization
points: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) with Pandas and visualization libraries

title: SQL for Data Science
points: Data manipulation and querying for analysis tasks

title: Machine Learning
points: Supervised learning algorithms (linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees, SVMs)
Introduction to ensemble methods and boosting algorithms

title: Deep Learning
points: Building deep neural networks with TensorFlow or PyTorch
Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) for computer vision tasks
Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) for sequential data and NLP tasks

title: Computer Vision
points: Object detection algorithms (YOLO, SSD, Faster R-CNN)
Transfer learning for computer vision tasks
Evaluation metrics for object detection models

title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
points: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) and Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks for NLP tasks

title: Model Deployment on Hugging Face
points: Introduction to Hugging Face Transformers library
Deploying machine learning models on the Hugging Face Model Hub
Fine-tuning pre-trained models for specific tasks
Hosting and serving models using Hugging Face's infrastructure

title: Generative AI
points: Creating LLM'S from scratch and Fine-tune.

title: Capstone Project
points: Emphasis on end-to-end 25+ project development, from data collection to model deployment.
